title: The Hand Of Blessing | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: The Hand Of Blessing | Joel Osteen
description:
When the Most High God placed His hand of blessing on your life, He marked you for greatness. He wants to bless you in such a way that you become an example of His goodness.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
